WorkItem.Description:
If you try to add to a WinJS windows 8 application the PhoneGap/Cordova win8 javascript library and then take the d.ts from https://github.com/borisyankov/DefinitelyTyped you get an error where it says that many of the types are duplicately defined. (Due to both PhoneGap and the core definitions)

Is there a way to resolve this in VS 2012?

Note, I have also asked this over on SO http://stackoverflow.com/questions/14597183/typescript-signature-for-is-duplicated

Sorry - I meant to add this as a 'discussion' item. Hope this is ok for now...
WorkItem.Summary: How to manage duplicate globals from different type definitions

Comments.Message:
As mentioned in the SO discussion there is no easy solution in VS. Closing as this is indeed better served as a discussion, here or on SO.

** Closed by paulb 01/30/2013 1:31PM
As mentioned in the SO thread, there is no easy solution except for updating the d.ts file.
